segments.text: Judy , what do you think of the new general manager ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: He has extensive experience , although the guy ’ s really deep , sometimes , it scares me .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I heard he's very clear about his likes and dislikes and he's not the type to just let things go , so don ’ t provoke him .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I know , and that's why I'm always respectful and I keep my distance . It's safer that way .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Me too , I don't know why , but every time I see the guy , I break into a cold sweat .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's in the eyes . They're the type that seems to look into your soul , making one really uneasy .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Whatever we said , we must be more careful .
segments.speaker: S1
